name: Rocked Up Mini Crystal Quartz Necklace - Green
description:
These beautiful crystal quartz pieces shimmer with colour. 
Properties of crystal quartz 
the most popular and versatile healing stone

aids concentration

stimulates the immune system

protects against negativity.

Wear your crystals alone or layer them with the bigger Rocked Up necklace to make a statement! Available with gold or silver chain. 
Rocked Up is Shh by Sadie's all-time best-selling necklace. It has featured in UK's Living Etc, UK's Woman and Home, Spain's We & You, NZ's Your Home and Garden, Women's Weekly NZ, NZ Herald, The Dominion Post, Kia Ora and Remix magazines, along with several Shoe Collection campaigns. See Shh by Sadie press here.
Presenter + activist Chessie King, US actress China Anne McClain, Kiwi singer Julia Deans, T's Megan Robinson and former Remix editor Tina Moore have all rocked the original Rocked Up statement necklaces!
Due to the natural nature of these quartz stones the exact pieces may vary from those photographed. Length approx 46cm.
